hero.title: Authentic Pakistani Basmati Rice
hero.subtitle: Experience the finest quality, traditionally grown, aromatic long-grain basmati rice from the fertile plains of Punjab, Pakistan.

about.title: About Al Rayyan
about.subtitle: A heritage of excellence in bringing Pakistan's finest basmati rice to Saudi Arabia
about.paragraph1: Al Rayyan was founded with a singular mission: to import the world's finest basmati rice from the fertile plains of Punjab, Pakistan to discerning consumers in Saudi Arabia and beyond.
about.paragraph2: Our rice is carefully cultivated using traditional farming practices that have been perfected over generations, ensuring each grain carries the authentic aroma and texture that premium basmati is known for.
about.paragraph3: We work directly with farming communities in Punjab, ensuring fair trade practices while maintaining strict quality control from field to packaging.

quality.description: Only the finest 2% of harvested rice meets our strict quality standards, ensuring an exceptional dining experience.

aged.description: Our rice is aged for 12-24 months, enhancing its flavor, aroma, and enabling the grains to reach their full length.

difference.title: The Al Rayyan Difference
